lead_paragraph: José Reyes didn't start the game because of an injury, Cliff Floyd and Carlos Beltrán were injured during the game,  and Pedro Martínez extended his streak without a victory to seven starts.
snippet: José Reyes didn't start the game because of an injury, Cliff Floyd and Carlos Beltrán were injured during the game,  and Pedro Martínez extended his streak without a victory to seven starts.
